name: Taphouse Taverns
address: The Taphouse Coquitlam, 405 North Rd #2, Coquitlam, BC V3K 3V9, Canada

hasMenuItem.description:

review.reviewBody: Always delicious best part is  they separate your food properly packaging is so important 10/10 for me thanks guys

Ginger beef was great! Had a noticeable ginger kick, pieces were a good size, slightly crispy and well coated but not drenched in sauce. Everything I want in a ginger beef dish.   
Unfortunately my partner's mac and cheese was burnt and he said it was really bland/didnt really taste like anything. He's definitely not the complaining type so take that how you will. Dasher mentioned it was a super busy night there, so maybe that was a factor. 
Items were well packed and well portioned. Will probably order from here again sometime, we just wont get the mac. ;)

Great sandwiches and burgers 
Always good
We shared the meal and both were very good! I like your new menu!!
often arrives without the upcharges i ordered (au jus for the steak sandwich, prawns for the cobb salad) and honestly kind of bland food sometimes. the Philly Cheesesteak was good though
